message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice, how about a 55/45 split in my favor?  Time is money, after all.
My turn again! 58-42 is still a generous offer considering the inflation on your side
Alice, let's be realistic.  The clock is ticking, and my share is diminishing.  52/48 is my final offer.
You said 52/48 was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. My offer is still better for you than waiting another round
